messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Many dreams are just chance.
For example, you dream about a phone call.
It is from an old friend.
Or you dream someone close to you dies.
These dreams are usually by chance.
They are not a sign about the future.
We also forget many dreams like this.
We forget them when nothing happens later.
